name: World Leaders
description:
Game Story
The dawn of a new world is upon us, and a global battle for supremacy ensues. Will you rise as the supreme leader of the most formidable nation on Earth? Your quest for dominance begins, but thousands of contenders share the same ambition. To succeed, you must hone your leadership skills, construct a thriving nation, forge alliances with global comrades, and prove your mettle as the world's ultimate leader!

Welcome to the ultimate turn-based strategy game for tacticians and conquerors!

Forge a New World Order
Following a massive uprising that toppled your nation's previous regime, you've been elected as the undisputed leader with the authority to rebuild. Your mission: transform this nation into an empire.

A Pledge of Loyalty
Your people look to you as their beacon of hope. Lead them to victory, and your name shall echo across the globe, a testament to your leadership and prowess. Build, develop, form alliances, and embrace your destiny as the Supreme Commander.

World Leaders: A Turn-Based Masterpiece
Embark on a journey from a humble nation's leader to the ruler of the entire world through diplomacy, strategy, and skill. Your objective: ascend above all and command thousands of global players. Utilize diplomacy, engage in warfare, and fortify your empire economically and militarily.

Game Features
* Resources, Factories, Stock Exchange, Weapons Markets, Diplomats, Alliances, United Nations, a Spy Center, a War Room, an Economic System, Technology, World Events, World News, and advanced Artificial Intelligence.

* An array of weaponry, including Armoured Personnel Carriers (APCs), Tanks, Artillery, Anti-Air Missiles, Helicopters, Fighter Jets, Ships, Submarines, Fighting Robots, Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs), Aircraft Carriers, and Ballistic missiles.

* Hundreds of espionage, war, diplomatic, and economic options to shape your empire.

Worldwide Top Leaders - Hall Of Fame
Leaders who maintain the top rank for over 7 days will be immortalized in the world leaders' hall of fame. Your status will be etched in history.

iGindis Games
Break language barriers and make global friends with iGindis Games. Our in-game translator ensures seamless communication among players worldwide. World Leaders supports thousands of players per world.

Accessibility Mode
For voice-over users, enable accessibility mode by tapping the screen three times with three fingers upon launching the game. Play the game using swipes and double-taps. (Please close TalkBack or any voice-over programs before opening the game.)
You can also enable/disable accessibility mode by clicking F1 or A in keyboard in the main screen.

Best of luck, Commander, in your quest for world domination!
